synopsis.text: Of all the days to be late for tennis practice, Himeko Tsubaki stumbles upon a magical crown that transforms her ordinary life into one of royal chaos. As the crown becomes permanently affixed to her head, she finds herself the unwilling target of various factions vying for its possession. From bumbling foreign thieves and a gibberish-speaking little girl to a cat-obsessed cult and an infatuated assassin, Himeko must navigate this newfound world of royal intrigue. All the while, a prissy classmate and even a pink cat king from another realm add to the hilarious hijinks that ensue. As Himeko attempts to maintain some semblance of normalcy, her life becomes anything but common.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
